name: Phase Cypher
description:
This is a demo of a puzzle game set inside a computer program. You must guide the avatar by using its data kite ability to bypass firewalls and open encryption locks. Malware viruses will impede your progress along the way. There are five stages in this demo, with the last one being a twist to the gameplay. 

Gameplay Controls:

W,A,S,D (move up, down, left and right)
Space bar (sends data at a 360 angle)
Z,X (alter the angle of data)
Q (phase data to get through firewalls)
